name: Symphony of Empires
description:
Symphony of empires is a free, open-source real-time grand strategy game set in 1825. It aims to emulate the politics of the Victorian Era, providing an immersive experience managing the economic, political and military aspects of a historical country, guiding it to domination.

Additionally, it also has the potential to be used as a game engine for other eras - it also allows for total map overhauls which means fantasy maps can be created with the game out-of-the-box.

Feel free to join our discord server! https://discord.gg/aT5taA6xDJ
